job_title: Vehicle Operator II, Autonomy Systems Validation
job_description:
• Attention to detail, excellent written and verbal communication skills and ability to describe events quickly and concisely.
• Must have a valid driver's license in the state of residence that you will be driving/operating a vehicle.
• Prior professional automotive driving or autonomous vehicle testing experience.
• No drug or alcohol related driving incidents in the last 3 years.
• No more than 1 serious moving violation in the last 3 years.
• Additional work and tasks as needed by the team.
• Must be flexible to work overtime as needed.
• Ability to travel up to 50% Minimum age of 21.

• Minimum of a Bachelor’s of Science Degree in Engineering or related science from an accredited university2+ years of applicable experience in the automotive or a related industry OR Master’s degree preferred Cursory understanding of primary vehicle systems, with experience running and maintaining a variety of vehicle level and component level tests a bonus Familiarity with work management systems similar to JIRA, JAMA, or Confluence for test planning, coordination, execution and issue tracking Experience with software related to CAD, vehicle level instrumentation, calibration, data logging and data acquisition systems Must have a valid driver's license in the state of residence that you will be driving/operating a vehicle 2+ years of applicable experience in the automotive or a related industry OR Master’s degree preferred No drug or alcohol related driving incidents in the last 3 years No more than 1 serious moving violation in the last 3 years Ability to work autonomously.
• Prepare and update test vehicles (hardware, software) and document condition and performance pre / during / post test for multiple attributes (NVH, Performance, Body / Chassis Structural Durability, others) as prescribed in test standards.
